description: Learn how to make this lemon cheesecake recipe. Make sure the cream cheese and eggs are room temperature to ensure the filling is nice and smooth.
keywords: Baked cheesecake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lemon,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Jan Feb 2020,Peanut free
name: Baked Lemon Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease and line a 20cm springform cake pan.

Place milk powder into a food processor and, with the motor running, add butter and process until combined. Press mixture over base and sides of pan and place onto a baking tray. Bake for 20 minutes or until crust is golden.

Process cream cheese in food processor until smooth. Add honey and, with the motor running, add eggs and then egg yolks, one at a time, until well combined, scraping the sides of the bowl every now and again. Add zest and lemon juice and process until smooth.
Pour mixture over base and bake for 50 minutes (the cheesecake will still have a slight wobble).
Turn off oven and prop door ajar. Cool for 15 minutes. Remove from oven and cool for 30 minutes then refrigerate overnight.
